title: Provided further that, in case of the non-viable scheme if CEO, SRA directs to club compulsorily with other scheme under this Regulation then same shall be allowed by charging premium at the rate of 20% of the ASR
clause_text: Provided further that, in case of the non-viable scheme if CEO, SRA directs to club compulsorily with other scheme under this Regulation then same shall be allowed by charging premium at the rate of 20% of the ASR.
section: Payments to be made to SRA and Instalments:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided further that, in case of the non-viable scheme if CEO, SRA directs to club compulsorily with other scheme under this Regulation then same shall be allowed by charging premium at the rate of 2
